Name: DropShip
Details: DropShips are intrastellar craft used for transport between JumpShips and planetary bodies, including landings. They two basic hullforms, spheroid or aerodyne, and their size can range from 200 to 100,000 tons, with a Leopard class vessel carrying 1,900 tons. DropShips are used mainly to ferry cargo and passengers but they can also be designed or refitted for combat operations.
